title.reduced: まもるクンは呪われてしまった

description.full: Download the manual for this game by locating the game on http://marketplace.xbox.com and selecting “See Game Manual". Japanese Language Game. Download the manual for this game by locating the game on http://marketplace.xbox.com and selecting “See Game Manual".The well received major video game entitled Mamoru Kun Wa Norowarete Shimatta (“The Cursed Mamoru”) will be available on Xbox 360 after the quality has been substantially improved.This game in non-refundable. For details, please see http://www.xbox.com/live/accounts. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.
description.short: アーケードで人気の「まもるクンが呪われてしまった！ 」がパワーアップしてXbox 360に登場！
